DOC.brief_summary: This study determine whether three manufacture lot V419 ( PR5I ) induce similar immune response antigen contain V419 give concomitantly Prevnar13™ RotaTeq™ .
DOC.brief_title: A Study V419 Given Concomitantly With Prevnar 13™ RotaTeq™ ( V419-006 )
DOC.detailed_description: This study partially Double-Blinded participant ' parents/guardians , investigator/study site personnel , Sponsor 's representative blind lot V419 participant randomize receive , participant 's treatment group ( V419 control ) .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria : Participant healthy infant Participant receive one dose monovalent hepatitis B vaccine prior 1 month age Exclusion Criteria : Participant receive one dose monovalent hepatitis B vaccine hepatitis B base combination vaccine prior study entry Participant vaccinate acellular pertussis whole cell pertussis base combination vaccine , haemophilus influenzae type b conjugate , poliovirus , pneumococcal conjugate pneumococcal polysaccharide , rotavirus , measles , mumps , rubella , varicella vaccine combination Participant illness fever within 24 hour study enrollment Participant vaccinate nonstudy vaccine ( i.e . inactivate , conjugate live virus vaccine within 30 day prior enrollment , except inactivate influenza vaccine , permit 15 day prior enrollment Participant his/her mother hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) seropositivity ( medical history ) Participant history haemophilus influenzae type B , hepatitis B , diphtheria , tetanus , pertussis , poliomyelitis , rotavirus , pneumococcal infection
